Title: VIR-319.01 Verify that the items have the following information shown additionally at the shopping cart
VIR-319.02 Verify that the shown data is valid
VIR-320.01 Verify that the link to the added product to the cart is shown to the shopper on the cart page
VIR-320.02 Verify that clicking on the link the shopper is moved to the product page
VIR-320.03 Verify that the shopper can continue the shopping by clicking on Continue Shopping page
VIR-320.04 Verify that the shopper is moved to the last product page which was viewed
VIR-321.01 Verify that the delete button is shown per each record from the cart
VIR-321.02 Verify that the deleted record is removed from the cart and total is recalculated appropriately
VIR-321.03 Verify that the recalculated total is shown at the mini cart on the Cart badge
VIR-325.01 Verify that the total quantity of items are shown on the cart
VIR-325.02 Verify that the quantity is based on the item level
VIR-326.01 Verify that the last 5 line items from the cart is shown to the customer if they hover the cart icon
VIR-326.02 Verify that the Cart is shown if click Checkout
VIR-326.03 Verify that the Cart Mini is closed if click Continue Shopping
VIR-326.04 Verify that the following information is shown for the line items
